sentence.Network_en: Maxine Waters is a Democratic Congresswoman, representing South Central Los Angeles.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛克辛·沃特斯是一名民主党女议员，代表洛杉矶市中南区。

sentence.Network_cn: 这次比赛吸引了代表8个不同国家的500多名参赛者。

entry.def: If someone such as a lawyer or a politician represents a person or group of people, they act on behalf of that person or group.

example.ex: ...the politicians we elect to represent us...
example.tran: 我们选举出来代表我们的政界人士

example.ex: The offer has yet to be accepted by the lawyers representing the victims.
example.tran: 受害者的代理律师还没有接受这个提议。

entry.def: If you represent a person or group at an official event, you go there on their behalf.

example.ex: The general secretary may represent the president at official ceremonies.
example.tran: 总书记可以在一些官方仪式上代表主席。

entry.tran: (在竞赛或体育赛事中)代表（国家或地区）
entry.def: If you represent your country or town in a competition or sports event, you take part in it on behalf of the country or town where you live.

example.ex: My only aim is to represent Britain at the Olympics.
example.tran: 我唯一的目标是代表英国参加奥运会。

entry.def: If a group of people or things is well represented in a particular activity or in a particular place, a lot of them can be found there.

example.ex: Women are already well represented in the area of TV drama...
example.tran: 女性在电视剧领域占据了一席之地。

example.ex: In New Mexico all kinds of cuisines are represented.
example.tran: 在新墨西哥州， 有各种各样的烹饪方法。

entry.tran: 相当于，代表着（变化、成就、胜利等）
entry.def: If you say that something represents a change, achievement, or victory, you mean that it is a change, achievement, or victory.

example.ex: The pieces on view are not grouped around any one theme, but rather represent superb examples from various periods...
example.tran: 展出的作品并非围绕着一个主题，而是不同时期的经典之作。

example.ex: These developments represented a major change in the established order.
example.tran: 这些发展代表了现有秩序的重大转变。

entry.tran: (标志或符号)意味着，代表着，标志着
entry.def: If a sign or symbol represents something, it is accepted as meaning that thing.

example.ex: ...a black dot in the middle of the circle is supposed to represent the source of the radiation.
example.tran: 圆圈中心的黑点应该是表示放射源。

entry.def: To represent an idea or quality means to be a symbol or an expression of that idea or quality.

example.ex: We believe you represent everything British racing needs.
example.tran: 我们相信你代表了英国赛马所需要的一切。

entry.def: If you represent a person or thing as a particular thing, you describe them as being that thing.

example.ex: The popular press tends to represent him as an environmental guru.
example.tran: 大众媒体往往把他描绘成环保领袖。

auth_sentence.content: I was apparently standing up there representing journalists everywhere.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was apparently standing up there representing journalists everywhere.

Sentence.sentence: Several opponents have recently emerged, ranging from rival tech giants such as Microsoft and Amazon to small bodies representing authors and publishers across the world.
